briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Sativex in Relieving Symptoms of Spasticity Due to Multiple Sclerosis
officialTitle: A Double Blind, Randomised, Placebo Controlled, Parallel Group Study of Sativex, in Subjects With Symptoms of Spasticity Due to Multiple Sclerosis.
summary: The purpose of this study was to assess the efficacy of Sativex in relieving symptoms of spasticity in multiple sclerosis

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean Spasticity 0-10 Numerical Rating Scale (NRS) Score During the Last 14 Day of Treatment (End of Treatment)

commonTop: Urinary Tract Infection Not Otherwise Specified
